```{r}
library(readr)
Export_metrics <- read_delim("Export-metrics-intervention-4405-2.csv", 
    delim = "\t", escape_double = FALSE, 
    trim_ws = TRUE)

coach <- Export_metrics[4:14,]
similarperson <- Export_metrics[17:27,]
doctor<- Export_metrics[30:40,]
text <- Export_metrics[43:49,]
cartoon_disney <- Export_metrics[52:62,]
cartoon_male <- Export_metrics[65:74,]
```

SC_1: coach
SC_2: similar person (.1)
SC_3: doctor (.2)
SC_4: text ('ik vond de tekt...')
SC_5: cartoon (disney) (.3)
SC_6: cartoon (male) (.4)

Voor de cartoon male is de laatste vraag missend (niet ingevoegd in TIIM).
